CheckTitle: EC2 instances should use Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2) to protect against SSRF vulnerabilities, you can set the default instance metadata version at the account level for each AWS Region
Description: Ensure that EC2 instances use Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2) to protect against SSRF vulnerabilities.
Risk: EC2 instances that use IMDSv1 are vulnerable to SSRF attacks.

Recommendation.Text: Enable Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2) on the EC2 instances. For more information, see the AWS documentation.
